entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , New-Wes-Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 11:30 AM NDT Monday 27 March 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries changing to a few rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 27 March 2023
